adjectives.description: foollike (comparative more foollike, superlative most foollike)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a fool.
examples: There are several things on Lear's mind here: sexual loathing, revenge, a hallucinatory, at times satirical, vision of court life and of himself as king, a foollike insistence on unpleasant truths in his conversations with Gloucester,  […]
